about_the_game:
Forge your destiny with everything from the Elite Riders Pack PLUS an additional exclusive mount, 30 days of Premium Service and much more!

With the exception of the Ellun box and the Premium Service, all items will be awarded to each character on the purchasing player’s account. The Ellun Box and Premium Service will be awarded to the first character created on the purchasing player’s account.

The Heroic Riders Pack includes:
* 7-Day Open Beta Head Start
* Closed Beta Access
* Mount: Diamond Wolf
* Mount: Amethyst Wolf
* Pet: Fairy Queen Elquines
* Ruby Wolf Skin
* Topaz Wolf Skin
* Premium Service (30-day)
* Ellun Box (100)
* Extra Character Slot
* Beautification Voucher
* Title: Hakanas Honorguard
* 100% Health Recovery Potion Box (30)
* 100% Mana Recovery Potion Box (30)
